REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0131 reute b f BC-SWEDEN-ISSUES-SEVEN-Y 04-03 0059

TEXT.TITLE: SWEDEN ISSUES SEVEN-YEAR DOMESTIC BOND
TEXT.BODY: Sweden's National Debt Office said it was issuing a four billion crown, seven-year domestic government bond with a coupon of 10.75 pct. It invited bids by April 6 and payment date for the loan is April 10. The issue, like all Swedish domestic paper, is closed to non-residents. REUTER
